name: Lake Valor Pokemon Showdown Style
description: A Lake Valor based CSS made for Pokemon Showdown servers, PS: this css is usable on servers, you can copy paste the css in your css file for your server if you want. If you see any error or something that looks weird, please PM me in a server such as LakeValor
